mapper.select: SELECT bi.image_name, b.book_title, b.book_price, od.order_count, (b.book_price * od.order_count) AS total_price,o.order_status FROM order_details od JOIN book b ON od.bno = b.bno JOIN cart c ON b.bno = c.bno JOIN orders o ON od.ono = o.ono JOIN book_image bi ON bi.bno = b.bno WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
